Split Fiction for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC, and Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC are the highlights of this week’s Japanese game releases.

item.title: Mortal Kombat 1 DLC Kameo Fighter Madam Bo teaser trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/mortal-kombat-1-dlc-kameo-fighter-madam-bo-teaser-trailer

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Due out alongside DLC character T-1000 on March 18.

Publisher Warner Bros. Games and developer NetherRealm Studios have released a new traler for Mortal Kombat 1 downloadable content Kameo Fighter Madamo Bo, who is due out on March 18 for Kombat Pack 2 / “Khaos Reigns” expansion owners and March 25 for all users.

Get the latest details below.

The video reveals new gameplay for the Tea House restaurateur and Lin Kuei ally, including a range of support moves and her Fatality. The Madam Bo Kameo Fighter will be available as a content update for all Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns owners at no additional cost or via standalone purchase on March 18.

The Madam Bo Kameo Fighter will launch alongside guest fighter T-1000 Terminator, the liquid metal-based cybernetic assassin from the Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991) film featuring the voice and likeness of actor Robert Patrick. The T-1000 will join the Mortal Kombat 1 roster on March 18 as part of the early access period for Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns Expansion owners, followed by wide availability for purchase on March 25.

Mortal Kombat 1 is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.
